description: Humorous pun on 'grater' sounding like 'greater', referring to larger issues than just cutting a finger.
title: Cheesy Dilemma
n_1: John, while making dinner, cuts his finger.
n_2: He continues to grate cheese, undeterred.
c1_2: Just a small cut, I'll manage.
c2_2: Maybe you should take a break?
n_3: Liz notices the growing pile of cheese.
c1_3: I might be making too much cheese.
c2_3: You think that's your big problem?
n_4: John reflects on his clumsy cooking escapades.
c1_4: Well, I may have grater problems!
c2_4: Guess your cooking is a cut above!
